participant_1.background:
I'm more interested in my education and my family than I am in social media.
I want my home to be filled with laughter and joy, just like my last vacation.
i like skateboarding.
I've never been to a fortune teller, but I'm curious what they'd have to say about my life as a tiger.
i love to eat fish.

participant_2.background:
I am a thirty-something male who decided to quit my job and travel the world for a couple of months.
I like to make jewelry out of silver wire and beads.
I don't want to follow in my dad's footsteps and inherit his appliance store.
i want to have two kids.
I wake up early to get a head start on my day, and I make sure to schedule time for soccer practice and spending time with my kids.

content.text: Hello!
Hey there!
What are you up to today?
Not much, just got back from a trip to Japan.
Japan! That sounds amazing! What was your favorite part?
I got to visit the Tokyo Tower and the Shinjuku Gyoen National Garden. It was so beautiful!
That sounds wonderful! I've always wanted to go to Japan.
You should! It's an amazing country.
I think I will! I'm definitely going to put it on my list of places to visit.
You should! It's an amazing country.
I think I will! I'm definitely going to put it on my list of places to visit.
I'm glad you're considering it! It's a great place to travel.
What do you like most about Japan?
I love the food, the culture, and the people.
I've heard the food is amazing!
It is! I could eat sushi all day long.
I love sushi! I'm so glad I'm talking to you!
Me too! I love talking about Japan.
I'm so excited to go now!
You're going to love it!
Thanks for the recommendation
